title-group.article-title: Analysis of the Heterogeneous Multiscale Method for Parabolic Homogenization Problems

abstract.p: The heterogeneous multiscale method (HMM) is applied to various parabolic problems with multiscale coefficients. These problems can be either linear or nonlinear. Optimal estimates are proved for the error between the HMM solution and the homogenized solution.
